meanings.definition: A tall chest of drawers, often with a mirror on top.
meanings.sent1: The highboys in the bedroom stored all of her clothes neatly.
meanings.sent2: She admired the antique highboys in the antique shop.
meanings.sent3: When the highboys started dancing, everyone was surprised.
meanings.sent4: The highboys stood like tall guardians in the room.
meanings.sent5: The highboys gleamed in the sunlight, reflecting their polished surfaces.

meanings.definition: A type of furniture with tall legs and a high back.
meanings.sent1: The highboys in the living room were elegant and stylish.
meanings.sent2: He preferred the comfort of the highboys over the low sofas.
meanings.sent3: The highboys whispered secrets to each other in the quiet room.
meanings.sent4: The highboys towered over the other furniture like kings on thrones.
meanings.sent5: The highboys added a touch of sophistication to the room with their tall stature.

meanings.definition: A style of clothing characterized by high-waisted pants.
meanings.sent1: She loved the vintage look of highboys with tucked-in blouses.
meanings.sent2: Highboys were all the rage in the fashion magazines.
meanings.sent3: The highboys at the party stood out with their unique style.
meanings.sent4: Her highboys ensemble made her feel confident and trendy.
meanings.sent5: The highboys trend brought back a retro vibe to the fashion scene.
